panels.description:
Number of GPUs in the cluster.

TODO: Currently it's showing k8s capacity. Ideally it should all underlying GPUs.
panels.title: 全部GPU

panels.description: Number of GPUs immediately assignable to jobs.
panels.title: 可分配的GPU

panels.description: Number of unhealthy GPUs in k8s or marked as unschedulable.

targets.expr: (sum(avg by (host_ip) (k8s_node_device_total{device_str='nvidia.com/gpu'}))  OR on() vector(0)) - (sum(avg by (host_ip) (k8s_node_device_allocatable{device_str='nvidia.com/gpu'})) OR on() vector(0))

panels.title: 不健康的GPU

panels.description:
Number of GPUs assigned to jobs.

TODO: Exclude unhealthy but in use GPUs.
panels.title: 分配的GPU

panels.description: Number of assigned GPUs having utilization > 0%.
panels.title: 活动的GPU

panels.description: Number of assigned GPUs having utilization 0%.

targets.expr: (count(avg by (uuid) (task_device_percent{device_str='nvidia.com/gpu'})) OR on() vector(0)) - (count(avg by (uuid) (task_device_percent{device_str='nvidia.com/gpu'}>0)) OR on() vector(0))

panels.title: 空闲的GPU

panels.description:
Number of NPUs in the cluster.

TODO: Currently it's showing k8s capacity. Ideally it should all underlying NPUs.
panels.title: 全部NPU

panels.description: Number of NPUs immediately assignable to jobs.
panels.title: 可分配的NPU

panels.description: Number of unhealthy NPUs in k8s or marked as unschedulable.

targets.expr: (sum(avg by (host_ip) (k8s_node_device_total{device_str='npu.huawei.com/NPU'})) OR on() vector(0)) - (sum(avg by (host_ip) (k8s_node_device_allocatable{device_str='npu.huawei.com/NPU'})) OR on() vector(0))

panels.title: 不健康的NPU

panels.description:
Number of NPUs assigned to jobs.

TODO: Exclude unhealthy but in use NPUs.
panels.title: 分配的NPU

panels.description: Number of assigned NPUs having utilization > 0%.
panels.title: 活动的NPU

panels.description: Number of assigned NPUs having utilization 0%.

targets.expr: (count(avg by (uuid) (task_device_percent{device_str='npu.huawei.com/NPU'})) OR on() vector(0)) - (count(avg by (uuid) (task_device_percent{device_str='npu.huawei.com/NPU'}>0)) OR on() vector(0))

panels.title: 空闲的NPU

panels.description: Device numbers in the cluster over time.

targets.expr: (count (avg by (uuid) (task_device_percent{device_str='nvidia.com/gpu'})) OR on() vector(0)) - (count(avg by (uuid) (task_device_percent{device_str='nvidia.com/gpu'}>0)) OR on() vector(0))
(count(avg by (uuid) (task_device_percent{device_str='npu.huawei.com/NPU'})) OR on() vector(0)) - (count(avg by (uuid) (task_device_percent{device_str='npu.huawei.com/NPU'}>0)) OR on() vector(0))

panels.title: 设备

panels.description: Average Device utilization in the cluster over time.

随时间变化的工作状态延迟
平均工作状态更改延迟

panels.description: Average GPU memory utilization per GPU across all active GPUs (>0%) in the cluster.

targets.expr: (sum((avg by (uuid) (task_device_percent{device_str='nvidia.com/gpu'} > bool 0) * task_device_mem_percent{device_str='nvidia.com/gpu'})) / count(avg by (uuid) (task_device_percent{device_str='nvidia.com/gpu'}>0))) OR on() vector(0)

panels.title: GPU内存

panels.description: Average GPU memory utilization per GPU across all active GPUs (>0%) in the cluster.

targets.expr: (sum((avg by (uuid) (task_device_percent{device_str='npu.huawei.com/NPU'} > bool 0) * task_device_mem_percent{device_str='npu.huawei.com/NPU'})) / count(avg by (uuid) (task_device_percent{device_str='npu.huawei.com/NPU'}>0))) OR on() vector(0)

随时间推移每个活动设备的资源

panels.description: Average Device memory utilization per active Device in the cluster.

targets.expr: (sum((avg by (uuid) (task_device_percent{device_str='nvidia.com/gpu'} > bool 0) * task_device_mem_percent{device_str='nvidia.com/gpu'})) / count(avg by (uuid) (task_device_percent{device_str='nvidia.com/gpu'}>0))) OR on() vector(0)

(sum((avg by (uuid) (task_device_percent{device_str='npu.huawei.com/NPU'} > bool 0) * task_device_mem_percent{device_str='npu.huawei.com/NPU'})) / count(avg by (uuid) (task_device_percent{device_str='npu.huawei.com/NPU'}>0))) OR on() vector(0)

panels.title: 每个活动设备的设备内存

panels.description: Average CPU usage per active Device in the cluster over time.
panels.title: 每个活动设备的CPU

panels.description: Average memory usage per active Device in the cluster.
panels.title: 每个活动设备的内存

targets.expr: sum(avg by (instance,vc_name) (k8s_vc_device_total{device_str='nvidia.com/gpu'})) by (vc_name) / ignoring (vc_name) group_left sum(avg by (instance,vc_name) (k8s_vc_device_total{device_str='nvidia.com/gpu'}))

sum(avg by (instance,vc_name) (k8s_vc_device_total{device_str='npu.huawei.com/NPU'})) by (vc_name) / ignoring (vc_name) group_left sum(avg by (instance,vc_name) (k8s_vc_device_total{device_str='npu.huawei.com/NPU'}))
sum(avg by (uuid,vc_name) (task_device_percent{device_str='nvidia.com/gpu'})) by (vc_name) / sum(avg by (uuid,vc_name) (k8s_vc_device_total{device_str='nvidia.com/gpu'})) by (vc_name)
sum(avg by (uuid,vc_name) (task_device_percent{device_str='npu.huawei.com/NPU'})) by (vc_name) / sum(avg by (uuid,vc_name) (k8s_vc_device_total{device_str='npu.huawei.com/NPU'})) by (vc_name)
count(avg by (uuid,vc_name) (task_device_percent{device_str='nvidia.com/gpu'})) by (vc_name) / sum(avg by (instance,vc_name) (k8s_vc_device_total{device_str='nvidia.com/gpu'})) by (vc_name)
count(avg by (uuid,vc_name) (task_device_percent{device_str='npu.huawei.com/NPU'})) by (vc_name) / sum(avg by (instance,vc_name) (k8s_vc_device_total{device_str='npu.huawei.com/NPU'})) by (vc_name)
count(avg by (uuid,vc_name)(task_device_percent{device_str='nvidia.com/gpu'}>0)) by (vc_name) / count(avg by (uuid,vc_name)(task_device_percent{device_str='nvidia.com/gpu'})) by (vc_name)
count(avg by (uuid,vc_name)(task_device_percent{device_str='npu.huawei.com/NPU'}>0)) by (vc_name) / count(avg by (uuid,vc_name)(task_device_percent{device_str='npu.huawei.com/NPU'})) by (vc_name)
